entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Record member does not match positional parameter" diagnostic message is unclear #67869
  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync reduces default expression removing relevant type arguments #67867
  • Test.cmd takes 35 minutes locally #67864
  • IDE0051 and IDE0052 are slow #67855

Closed

  • `SyntaxFacts.IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` only returns true for all global attribute targets #67485
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33618.212 #67866
  • Completion from unimported namespaces doesn't honour implicit usings #58473
    Backlog
  • LSP pull diagnostics performance issues in squiggles + error list #65935
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Flatten code actions when client doesn't have VS capability #67868
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix lsp classification mappings #67865
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better recover from missing closing `}` or `]` in switch statements #67862
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Adjust `IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` helper #67833
    Next
  • Backport #67430 further #67851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only sync events about C# and VB to unit testing service #67863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Adds InternalsVisibleTo for External Access layer for razor benchmark project #67853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Only used cached remote-host-provider for preview workspace if it shares the same set of host-services. #67840
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add A/B option to test if a pushing data immediately to secondary storage is desirable. #67843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not allocate Location[]s for source methods #67823
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #67870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clarify documentation of `TrackedOutputSteps` #67835
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
